subject: Computer Technology

overview.description: Comprehensive computer technology curriculum providing hands-on training in computer hardware, networking, software development, and IT support for technical career preparation in the digital age

learning_objectives: Master computer hardware assembly, maintenance, and troubleshooting
Develop networking skills and cybersecurity awareness
Create software applications and web-based solutions
Understand IT service management and technical support
Prepare for IT industry certifications and career pathways

units.title: Computer Hardware and System Assembly
learning_outcomes: Understand computer architecture and component functions
Assemble, configure, and optimize computer systems
Install and configure operating systems and drivers

lessons.title: Complete PC Build and Configuration Project
objectives: Assemble complete computer system from individual components
Install and configure operating system and essential software
Optimize system performance and troubleshoot issues

activities.description: Research and select compatible components for specific use case
Assemble complete computer system following best practices
Install operating system, drivers, and essential software
Test system performance and stability
Document build process and create system specifications

cross_curricular_connections: Electrical Technology: Power supply and electrical connections

lessons.title: Enterprise Network Design and Implementation
objectives: Design scalable network topology for business environment
Configure routers, switches, and wireless access points
Implement network security policies and access controls

activities.description: Design network topology for multi-department organization
Configure routers, switches, and wireless infrastructure
Implement VLANs, firewalls, and access control lists
Test network connectivity and security measures
Create network documentation and maintenance procedures

cross_curricular_connections: Business Studies: Organizational requirements and workflows
Mathematics: Network addressing and subnetting calculations

units.title: Software Development and Web Technologies
learning_outcomes: Develop applications using modern programming languages
Create responsive web applications and services
Apply software engineering principles and version control

lessons.title: Full-Stack Web Application Development
objectives: Develop complete web application with frontend and backend
Implement database integration and user authentication
Deploy application to cloud platform with proper security

activities.description: Analyze user requirements and design application architecture
Develop responsive user interface using modern web frameworks
Create server-side logic and RESTful API endpoints
Design and implement database schema with data access layer
Deploy application and conduct comprehensive testing

assessment_criteria: Code quality and software engineering practices (30%)
cross_curricular_connections: Design Technology: User experience and interface design
Business Studies: Requirements analysis and project management

units.title: Cybersecurity and IT Service Management
learning_outcomes: Implement security policies and incident response procedures
Provide technical support and help desk services
Manage IT assets and service delivery processes

lessons.title: Cybersecurity Incident Response and Digital Forensics
objectives: Detect and analyze cybersecurity threats and incidents
Implement incident response procedures and forensic analysis
Develop security awareness training and policies

activities.description: Simulate various cybersecurity attacks in controlled environment
Practice incident response procedures and evidence collection
Conduct digital forensic analysis using professional tools
Develop security policies and awareness training materials
Present findings and recommendations to stakeholders

cross_curricular_connections: Law and Ethics: Legal aspects of cybersecurity and privacy
Psychology: Social engineering and human factors in security

laboratory_projects: Complete computer system build and optimization
Full-stack web application development and deployment
Cybersecurity assessment and incident response simulation
real_world_applications: Help desk and technical support services
capstone_projects: Smart campus IoT system design and implementation
Digital transformation solution for small business

software_certifications: Cloud platform certifications (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)

equipment_and_facilities: Computer hardware laboratory with latest components
digital_resources: Certification study materials and practice exams

career_pathways: Computer support specialist and help desk technician
Software developer and web application programmer
Information security analyst and cybersecurity specialist
IT project coordinator and systems analyst

internship_programs: Local IT companies and service providers
Healthcare and financial services IT departments
Technology startups and software development firms
professional_development: Industry expert guest lectures and workshops
employment_preparation: Technical interview preparation and coding challenges
Career counseling and job placement assistance
